title: When will the Summoners Rift Map
body: Stop being listed as (Beta). It urks me.

replies.body: What does it matter, the beta writing doesnt change a damn thing...

> [{quoted}](name=SÃ¢intphoenix,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=AEyhrQ18,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-01-18T02:56:30.888+0000)
>
> What does it matter, the beta writing doesnt change a damn thing...

But don't you understand? It 'urks' him!
Oh ok, so the fact this post urks me means that he should delete it, logic yeah?

When Season 5 starts officially most likely. It's just a way of making it clear to people that the map is new, still potentially has bugs (it did have a few when it first came out) and so is still considered to be "in testing" during the pre-season.
